document_data.name: Cheesecloth
document_data.mainbody: '''Cheesecloth''' was a form of textile in the Realms so named for its use in [[cheese]]making.
document_data.Usages: The primary use of cheesecloth across [[Faer√ªn]] was in some styles of cheesemaking, where it was used as a sieve to remove and drain whey from cheese curds. One such style of cheese that utilized cheesecloth in its preparation was [[farmer's cheese]].{{ Cite book/The Sea Devil's Eye/Paperback 2000|?|14}} or as a material to wrap food in.<ref>
